displayName.text: Fred Astaire Dance Studios - Upper East Side

formattedAddress: 1289 Madison Ave 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10128, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Fred Astaire Dance Studios - Upper East Side
Fred Astaire Dance Studios - Upper East Side

adrFormatAddress: 1289 Madison Ave 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
What a wonderful experience my husband and I had at the Upper East Side Fred Astaire Dance Studio. Olha was our patient and very talented instructor, professional to a T, but also fun. The entire staff is warm, encouraging and so, so nice. The studio is lovely and airy.
We signed up for an introductory offer ahead of our son’s wedding, but were soon hooked and signed up for additional lessons. Ohla even gave my son and me a Mother and Son dance lesson. Thanks to Olha we were a hit!
Thank you, Ohla and the staff, for empowering us to get out on the dance floor and “strut” our stuff.

Bob + Julie

originalText.text: We used this studio for helping us with our first dance. Mandy gave us the perfect routine and catered it to exactly what we wanted and our skill level.

text.text: We used this studio for helping us with our first dance. Mandy gave us the perfect routine and catered it to exactly what we wanted and our skill level.

originalText.text: My wife and I wanted to learn different dance styles and choreograph a routine for our first dance at our wedding. We worked with Angelina and had an amazing experience with her. She knows how to effectively break down steps and combinations so they are easy to understand and perform. She was very patient as she taught us the basics and helped us craft a wedding dance that we'll never forget. She also gave us confidence to perform (especially with the lift!). Our guests were surprised and impressed with the performance, and were still talking about it months after the wedding. Angelina also taught us several different types of dance styles that we were able to use during open dance at our wedding. She knows how to start off slowly with the basics, and then work up to the more complex steps without making you feel overwhelmed. If you're interested in learning to dance, brushing up on your dance moves, or choreographing a memorable wedding dance routine, then Angelina is your girl!

originalText.text: My fiance and I came to the studio looking to learn some dancing skills before our wedding in a few months and we had an amazing experience working with Aleksandr and the rest of the team at the Fred Astaire Studio on the Upper East Side. The whole team was incredibly friendly, brought a great energy, deep level of knowledge and teaching-skill to our lesson. We had a fantastic experience and would definitely recommend them for anyone looking to learn or improve their dancing skills!

originalText.text: Great studio! Me and my wife came here for a wedding routine and the guys did a great job creating it for us and teaching us. We were able to do a nice performance in a very short period of time. Great experience overall.
